metadata.title: CVE-2024-10460 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The origin of an external protocol handler prompt could have been obscuredusing a data: URL within an `iframe`. This vulnerability affects Firefox <132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
